metadata.name: climbing MEGA mountain
metadata.description:
climbing MEGA mountain

A collaborative artwork by Meta Mountaineers and noahheim

The winning wallet of initial auction will be eligible for NFT airdrops from the Genesis Meta Mountaineers collection including but not limited to:

1x one of one "Top of Everest" mountaineer  
10x treasury mountaineers  
100x $TRAIL tokens

Initial auction sale profit distribution:  
50% of sale profit will be locked for community $TRAIL rewards  
40% of sale profit will be allocated to artists/creators  
10% of sale profit will be donated to Alliance for International Reforestation Inc.

Artwork & Music licensed under NFT License 2.0
